p: Statistical analysis. The data were presented as means ± standard deviations (SD) of triplicate measurements. Statistical analysis of data was performed using one-way ANOVA by SPSS‎ (version 16.0; ‎‏ ‏IBM‏ ‏Corp. Armonk, ‎USA)‎, and multiple comparisons of means were done through the Duncan test. Differences were considered significant when p ≤ 0.05. Also, independent sample t-test was used to compare the results of S. aureus and Y. enterocolitica with each other.
